nodes.text: Baradium charges were explosives that made use of the radioactive chemical baradium. The charges cost 750 credits per unit. Though their blast radius was rather small, the radiation produced by the charges could affect entire planets.
Baradium charges were mentioned in Gadgets and Gear, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
